segment.source: Identifying Your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Deployment Goals (Windows 10)
segment.target: Identifying Your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Deployment Goals (Windows 10)

segment.source: Identifying Your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Deployment Goals
segment.target: Identifying Your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Deployment Goals

segment.source: Identifying Your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Deployment Goals
segment.target: Identifying Your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Deployment Goals

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview
segment.target: Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview

segment.source: Correctly identifying your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals is essential for the success of your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security design project.
segment.target: Correctly identifying your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals is essential for the success of your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security design project.

segment.source: Form a project team that can clearly articulate deployment issues in a vision statement.
segment.target: Form a project team that can clearly articulate deployment issues in a vision statement.

segment.source: When you write your vision statement, identify, clarify, and refine your deployment goals.
segment.target: When you write your vision statement, identify, clarify, and refine your deployment goals.

segment.source: Prioritize and, if possible, combine your deployment goals so that you can design and deploy Windows Firewall with Advanced Security by using an iterative approach.
segment.target: Prioritize and, if possible, combine your deployment goals so that you can design and deploy Windows Firewall with Advanced Security by using an iterative approach.

segment.source: You can take advantage of the predefined Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals presented in this guide that are relevant to your scenarios.
segment.target: You can take advantage of the predefined Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals presented in this guide that are relevant to your scenarios.

segment.source: The following table lists the three main tasks for articulating, refining, and subsequently documenting your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals.
segment.target: The following table lists the three main tasks for articulating, refining, and subsequently documenting your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals.

segment.source: Deployment goal tasks
segment.target: Deployment goal tasks

segment.source: Reference links
segment.target: Reference links

segment.source: Evaluate predefined Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals that are provided in this section of the guide, and combine one or more goals to reach your organizational objectives.
segment.target: Evaluate predefined Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals that are provided in this section of the guide, and combine one or more goals to reach your organizational objectives.

segment.source: Predefined deployment goals:
segment.target: Predefined deployment goals:

segment.source: Protect Devices from Unwanted Network Traffic
segment.target: Protect Devices from Unwanted Network Traffic

segment.source: Restrict Access to Only Trusted Devices
segment.target: Restrict Access to Only Trusted Devices

segment.source: Require Encryption When Accessing Sensitive Network Resources
segment.target: Require Encryption When Accessing Sensitive Network Resources

segment.source: Restrict Access to Sensitive Resources to Only Specified Users or Devices
segment.target: Restrict Access to Sensitive Resources to Only Specified Users or Devices

segment.source: Map one goal or a combination of the predefined deployment goals to an existing Windows Firewall with Advanced Security design.
segment.target: Map one goal or a combination of the predefined deployment goals to an existing Windows Firewall with Advanced Security design.

segment.source: Mapping Your Deployment Goals to a Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Design
segment.target: Mapping Your Deployment Goals to a Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Design

segment.source: Based on the status of your current infrastructure, document your deployment goals for your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security design into a deployment plan.
segment.target: Based on the status of your current infrastructure, document your deployment goals for your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security design into a deployment plan.

segment.source: Designing A Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Strategy
segment.target: Designing A Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Strategy

segment.target: Planning Your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Design
